segments.text: We need to elect club officials before the summer starts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess we should start with nominees first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's make it the first item of business in our next meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We should probably let everyone know ahead of time so they will be prepared .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you take care of sending out a bulletin by e-mail to all the club members ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can do that this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's schedule the actual election times the week after the nominations . Doesn't that seem logical ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , let me put it on the calendar .
segments.speaker: S2
